<div class="wp-block-column is-vertically-aligned-center is-layout-flow wp-block-column-is-layout-flow" style="flex-basis:100%">
<h3 class="wp-block-heading has-text-align-center has-medium-font-size"><strong><strong><strong><strong><strong><strong><strong><strong>Epic <strong>Fantasy</strong> Music on Tidal:</strong></strong></strong></strong></strong></strong></strong></strong></h3>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-column is-layout-flow wp-block-column-is-layout-flow" style="flex-basis:100%">
<div class="wp-block-buttons is-horizontal is-content-justification-center is-layout-flex wp-container-core-buttons-is-layout-03627597 wp-block-buttons-is-layout-flex">
<div class="wp-block-button has-custom-width wp-block-button__width-50"><a class="wp-block-button__link wp-element-button" href="https://listen.tidal.com/playlist/9480df2e-163d-4a09-aeb5-601d42b95abd">Tidal</a></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-columns alignwide is-layout-flex wp-container-core-columns-is-layout-28f84493 wp-block-columns-is-layout-flex">
<div class="wp-block-column is-vertically-aligned-center is-layout-flow wp-block-column-is-layout-flow" style="flex-basis:100%">
<h3 class="wp-block-heading has-text-align-center has-medium-font-size"><strong><strong><strong><strong><strong><strong><strong><strong>Epic <strong>Fantasy</strong> Music on Amazon Music:</strong></strong></strong></strong></strong></strong></strong></strong></h3>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-column is-layout-flow wp-block-column-is-layout-flow" style="flex-basis:100%">

</div>
</div>
</div>



<p class="has-text-align-center">More info below.</p>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-group alignwide has-medium-font-size is-layout-flow wp-block-group-is-layout-flow" style="padding-bottom:100px">
<p>I <a href="https://demfirecreation.com/playlists"><strong>curate playlists</strong></a> on Spotify, YouTube Music, Deezer and Tidal.</p>



<p>After Epic Ⅰ, Epic Ⅱ &amp; Epic Ⅲ, this is my fourth epic playlist&#8217;s dedicated page, Epic Ⅳ: the epic fantasy playlist aka &#8220;Epic Fantasy Adventure/Elves&#8221;.</p>



<p>The playlist&#8217;s genres, subgenres and global information can be found below.</p>



<p>And some more information can be found in the second section, like songs and their respective artists that I listed under specific genre categories.</p>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-group alignwide has-medium-font-size is-layout-flow wp-container-core-group-is-layout-03c184c1 wp-block-group-is-layout-flow" style="padding-bottom:100px">
<h2 class="wp-block-heading has-text-align-center has-large-font-size" style="padding-bottom:30px">Epic Fantasy Music Playlist</h2>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading has-text-align-left has-medium-font-size"><strong>Cover Art &amp; Story Opening</strong></h3>



<div class="wp-block-columns is-layout-flex wp-container-core-columns-is-layout-28f84493 wp-block-columns-is-layout-flex">
<div class="wp-block-column is-layout-flow wp-block-column-is-layout-flow" style="flex-basis:100%">
<div class="wp-block-group is-content-justification-center is-nowrap is-layout-flex wp-container-core-group-is-layout-23441af8 wp-block-group-is-layout-flex">
<figure class="wp-block-image size-full"><img data-recalc-dims="1" decoding="async" width="300" height="300" src="https://i0.wp.com/demfirecreation.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/04-epic-fantasy-music.webp?resize=300%2C300&#038;ssl=1" alt="Epic Fantasy" class="wp-image-750" style="object-fit:cover" srcset="https://i0.wp.com/demfirecreation.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/04-epic-fantasy-music.webp?w=300&amp;ssl=1 300w, https://i0.wp.com/demfirecreation.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/04-epic-fantasy-music.webp?resize=150%2C150&amp;ssl=1 150w, https://i0.wp.com/demfirecreation.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/04-epic-fantasy-music.webp?resize=200%2C200&amp;ssl=1 200w" sizes="(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px" /></figure>
</div>



<p class="has-text-align-center has-medium-font-size">Epic Ⅳ</p>



<p class="has-text-align-center has-small-font-size">&#8220;Danger lies ahead<br>Through waters and skies<br>I must fulfill—my destiny&#8221;<br>―Demfire Creation</p>
</div>
</div>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading has-medium-font-size"><strong>General Information</strong></h3>



<div class="wp-block-columns is-layout-flex wp-container-core-columns-is-layout-28f84493 wp-block-columns-is-layout-flex">
<div class="wp-block-column is-layout-flow wp-block-column-is-layout-flow">
<p>Specifications:</p>



<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>Song count: 80+</li>



<li>Duration: 4h+</li>



<li>Don&#8217;t shuffle</li>



<li>Updates on Friday</li>
</ul>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-column is-layout-flow wp-block-column-is-layout-flow">
<p>Type of music:</p>



<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>Soundtracks (OST):
<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>Video game music (VGM)</li>



<li>Film/movie scores</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>



<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>Background music (BGM)</li>
</ul>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-column is-layout-flow wp-block-column-is-layout-flow">
<p>Genre:</p>



<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>Epic fantasy music</li>



<li>Epic adventure music</li>



<li>Elf chants</li>
</ul>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-column is-layout-flow wp-block-column-is-layout-flow">
<p>Subgenres:</p>



<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>RPG music</li>



<li>MMORPG music</li>



<li>DnD background music</li>



<li>Magical music</li>



<li>Emotional music</li>
</ul>
</div>
</div>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-group alignwide has-medium-font-size is-layout-flow wp-block-group-is-layout-flow" style="padding-bottom:100px">
<h2 class="wp-block-heading has-text-align-center has-large-font-size" style="padding-bottom:30px">Epic Fantasy Music</h2>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading has-medium-font-size"><strong>Theme</strong></h3>



<p>My diverse playlist offers a variety of themes with a primary focus on fantasy.</p>



<p>You&#8217;ll find everything from epic orchestral pieces to soothing background tracks and even some elvish chants that you will encounter every few tracks for a touch of mysticism.</p>



<p>Some of the standout artists and songs featured in my playlist include:</p>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading has-medium-font-size"><strong>High Fantasy Music</strong></h3>



<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>&#8220;Main Theme pt.2&#8221; by Borislav Slavov from Baldur&#8217;s Gate 3 OST</li>



<li>&#8220;Ezio&#8217;s Family&#8221; by Jesper Kyd from Assassin&#8217;s Creed 2 OST</li>



<li>&#8220;The Banks Of The Sansretour&#8221; by Piotr Musial from The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt &#8211; Blood and Wine OST</li>
</ul>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading has-medium-font-size"><strong>Epic Adventure Music</strong></h3>



<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>&#8220;A Land of War and Poetry&#8221; by Brad Derrick &amp; Jeremy Soule from The Elder Scrolls Online: Morrowind OST</li>



<li>&#8220;A Son&#8217;s Path&#8221; by Bear McCreary from God of War: Ragnarök OST</li>



<li>&#8220;Epic Gaming Music (Enemy Airship Theme)&#8221; by Demfire Creation, album Epic Music Debut</li>
</ul>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading has-medium-font-size"><strong>Epic Elf Songs</strong></h3>



<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>&#8220;Forest Calling&#8221; by Bill Brown from Lineage 2 &#8211; Chaotic Chronicle OST</li>



<li>&#8220;Lust&#8221; by Inon Zur from Lineage 2 &#8211; Interlude OST</li>



<li>&#8220;Nightsong&#8221; by Neal Acree from World of Warcraft: Cataclysm OST</li>
</ul>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading has-medium-font-size"><strong>Heroic Fantasy Music</strong></h3>



<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>&#8220;People of the Land&#8221; by Jan Valta &amp; Adam Sporka from Kingdom Come: Deliverance OST</li>



<li>&#8220;Haven&#8221; by Jason Grave from Heroes of Might and Magic VI OST</li>



<li>&#8220;Shado-Pan&#8221; by Sam Cardon &amp; Jeremy Soule from World of Warcraft: Mist of Pandaria OST</li>
</ul>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading has-medium-font-size"><strong>Epic RPG Music</strong></h3>



<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>&#8220;The Vagabond&#8221; by Marcin Przybylowicz from The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt OST</li>



<li>&#8220;Ancient Forest&#8221; by NCSOFT from Aion OST</li>



<li>&#8220;Coastal Vivarium&#8221; by J Scott Rakozy from Hogwarts Legacy OST</li>
</ul>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading has-medium-font-size"><strong>DnD Background Music</strong></h3>



<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>&#8220;Kingdom of Bards&#8221; by Adrian Von Ziegler, album Libertas</li>



<li>&#8220;Harvest Dawn&#8221; by Jeremy Soule from The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion OST</li>



<li>&#8220;Caravans Crossing&#8221; by Jamie Christopherson from Lineage 2 Chaotic Chronicle OST</li>
</ul>
</div>

	( function() {
		var skipLinkTarget = document.querySelector( 'main' ),
			sibling,
			skipLinkTargetID,
			skipLink;

		// Early exit if a skip-link target can't be located.
		if ( ! skipLinkTarget ) {
			return;
		}

		/*
		 * Get the site wrapper.
		 * The skip-link will be injected in the beginning of it.
		 */
		sibling = document.querySelector( '.wp-site-blocks' );

		// Early exit if the root element was not found.
		if ( ! sibling ) {
			return;
		}

		// Get the skip-link target's ID, and generate one if it doesn't exist.
		skipLinkTargetID = skipLinkTarget.id;
		if ( ! skipLinkTargetID ) {
			skipLinkTargetID = 'wp--skip-link--target';
			skipLinkTarget.id = skipLinkTargetID;
		}

		// Create the skip link.
		skipLink = document.createElement( 'a' );
		skipLink.classList.add( 'skip-link', 'screen-reader-text' );
		skipLink.id = 'wp-skip-link';
		skipLink.href = '#' + skipLinkTargetID;
		skipLink.innerText = 'Skip to content';

		// Inject the skip link.
		sibling.parentElement.insertBefore( skipLink, sibling );
	}() );

<div class="wp-block-group alignwide has-medium-font-size is-layout-flow wp-block-group-is-layout-flow" style="padding-bottom:100px">
<p>I <a href="https://demfirecreation.com/playlists"><strong>curate playlists</strong></a> on Spotify, YouTube Music, Deezer and Tidal.</p>



<p>After Epic Ⅰ, Epic Ⅱ &amp; Epic Ⅲ, this is my fourth epic playlist&#8217;s dedicated page, Epic Ⅳ: the epic fantasy playlist aka &#8220;Epic Fantasy Adventure/Elves&#8221;.</p>



<p>The playlist&#8217;s genres, subgenres and global information can be found below.</p>



<p>And some more information can be found in the second section, like songs and their respective artists that I listed under specific genre categories.</p>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-group alignwide has-medium-font-size is-layout-flow wp-container-core-group-is-layout-03c184c1 wp-block-group-is-layout-flow" style="padding-bottom:100px">
<h2 class="wp-block-heading has-text-align-center has-large-font-size" style="padding-bottom:30px">Epic Fantasy Music Playlist</h2>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading has-text-align-left has-medium-font-size"><strong>Cover Art &amp; Story Opening</strong></h3>



<div class="wp-block-columns is-layout-flex wp-container-core-columns-is-layout-28f84493 wp-block-columns-is-layout-flex">
<div class="wp-block-column is-layout-flow wp-block-column-is-layout-flow" style="flex-basis:100%">
<div class="wp-block-group is-content-justification-center is-nowrap is-layout-flex wp-container-core-group-is-layout-23441af8 wp-block-group-is-layout-flex">
<figure class="wp-block-image size-full"><img data-recalc-dims="1" decoding="async" width="300" height="300" src="https://i0.wp.com/demfirecreation.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/04-epic-fantasy-music.webp?resize=300%2C300&#038;ssl=1" alt="Epic Fantasy" class="wp-image-750" style="object-fit:cover" srcset="https://i0.wp.com/demfirecreation.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/04-epic-fantasy-music.webp?w=300&amp;ssl=1 300w, https://i0.wp.com/demfirecreation.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/04-epic-fantasy-music.webp?resize=150%2C150&amp;ssl=1 150w, https://i0.wp.com/demfirecreation.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/04-epic-fantasy-music.webp?resize=200%2C200&amp;ssl=1 200w" sizes="(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px" /></figure>
</div>



<p class="has-text-align-center has-medium-font-size">Epic Ⅳ</p>



<p class="has-text-align-center has-small-font-size">&#8220;Danger lies ahead<br>Through waters and skies<br>I must fulfill—my destiny&#8221;<br>―Demfire Creation</p>
</div>
</div>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading has-medium-font-size"><strong>General Information</strong></h3>



<div class="wp-block-columns is-layout-flex wp-container-core-columns-is-layout-28f84493 wp-block-columns-is-layout-flex">
<div class="wp-block-column is-layout-flow wp-block-column-is-layout-flow">
<p>Specifications:</p>



<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>Song count: 80+</li>



<li>Duration: 4h+</li>



<li>Don&#8217;t shuffle</li>



<li>Updates on Friday</li>
</ul>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-column is-layout-flow wp-block-column-is-layout-flow">
<p>Type of music:</p>



<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>Soundtracks (OST):
<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>Video game music (VGM)</li>



<li>Film/movie scores</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>



<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>Background music (BGM)</li>
</ul>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-column is-layout-flow wp-block-column-is-layout-flow">
<p>Genre:</p>



<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>Epic fantasy music</li>



<li>Epic adventure music</li>



<li>Elf chants</li>
</ul>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-column is-layout-flow wp-block-column-is-layout-flow">
<p>Subgenres:</p>



<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>RPG music</li>



<li>MMORPG music</li>



<li>DnD background music</li>



<li>Magical music</li>



<li>Emotional music</li>
</ul>
</div>
</div>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-group alignwide has-medium-font-size is-layout-flow wp-block-group-is-layout-flow" style="padding-bottom:100px">
<h2 class="wp-block-heading has-text-align-center has-large-font-size" style="padding-bottom:30px">Epic Fantasy Music</h2>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading has-medium-font-size"><strong>Theme</strong></h3>



<p>My diverse playlist offers a variety of themes with a primary focus on fantasy.</p>



<p>You&#8217;ll find everything from epic orchestral pieces to soothing background tracks and even some elvish chants that you will encounter every few tracks for a touch of mysticism.</p>



<p>Some of the standout artists and songs featured in my playlist include:</p>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading has-medium-font-size"><strong>High Fantasy Music</strong></h3>



<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>&#8220;Main Theme pt.2&#8221; by Borislav Slavov from Baldur&#8217;s Gate 3 OST</li>



<li>&#8220;Ezio&#8217;s Family&#8221; by Jesper Kyd from Assassin&#8217;s Creed 2 OST</li>



<li>&#8220;The Banks Of The Sansretour&#8221; by Piotr Musial from The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt &#8211; Blood and Wine OST</li>
</ul>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading has-medium-font-size"><strong>Epic Adventure Music</strong></h3>



<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>&#8220;A Land of War and Poetry&#8221; by Brad Derrick &amp; Jeremy Soule from The Elder Scrolls Online: Morrowind OST</li>



<li>&#8220;A Son&#8217;s Path&#8221; by Bear McCreary from God of War: Ragnarök OST</li>



<li>&#8220;Epic Gaming Music (Enemy Airship Theme)&#8221; by Demfire Creation, album Epic Music Debut</li>
</ul>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading has-medium-font-size"><strong>Epic Elf Songs</strong></h3>



<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>&#8220;Forest Calling&#8221; by Bill Brown from Lineage 2 &#8211; Chaotic Chronicle OST</li>



<li>&#8220;Lust&#8221; by Inon Zur from Lineage 2 &#8211; Interlude OST</li>



<li>&#8220;Nightsong&#8221; by Neal Acree from World of Warcraft: Cataclysm OST</li>
</ul>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading has-medium-font-size"><strong>Heroic Fantasy Music</strong></h3>



<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>&#8220;People of the Land&#8221; by Jan Valta &amp; Adam Sporka from Kingdom Come: Deliverance OST</li>



<li>&#8220;Haven&#8221; by Jason Grave from Heroes of Might and Magic VI OST</li>



<li>&#8220;Shado-Pan&#8221; by Sam Cardon &amp; Jeremy Soule from World of Warcraft: Mist of Pandaria OST</li>
</ul>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading has-medium-font-size"><strong>Epic RPG Music</strong></h3>



<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>&#8220;The Vagabond&#8221; by Marcin Przybylowicz from The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt OST</li>



<li>&#8220;Ancient Forest&#8221; by NCSOFT from Aion OST</li>



<li>&#8220;Coastal Vivarium&#8221; by J Scott Rakozy from Hogwarts Legacy OST</li>
</ul>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading has-medium-font-size"><strong>DnD Background Music</strong></h3>



<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>&#8220;Kingdom of Bards&#8221; by Adrian Von Ziegler, album Libertas</li>



<li>&#8220;Harvest Dawn&#8221; by Jeremy Soule from The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion OST</li>



<li>&#8220;Caravans Crossing&#8221; by Jamie Christopherson from Lineage 2 Chaotic Chronicle OST</li>
</ul>
</div>

		if ( ! skipLinkTarget ) {

		 * Get the site wrapper.
		 * The skip-link will be injected in the beginning of it.

		sibling.parentElement.insertBefore( skipLink, sibling );

<div class="wp-block-group alignwide has-medium-font-size is-layout-flow wp-block-group-is-layout-flow" style="padding-bottom:100px">
<p>I <a href="https://demfirecreation.com/playlists"><strong>curate playlists</strong></a> on Spotify, YouTube Music, Deezer and Tidal.</p>



<p>After Epic Ⅰ, Epic Ⅱ &amp; Epic Ⅲ, this is my fourth epic playlist&#8217;s dedicated page, Epic Ⅳ: the epic fantasy playlist aka &#8220;Epic Fantasy Adventure/Elves&#8221;.</p>



<p>The playlist&#8217;s genres, subgenres and global information can be found below.</p>



<p>And some more information can be found in the second section, like songs and their respective artists that I listed under specific genre categories.</p>

<div class="wp-block-group alignwide has-medium-font-size is-layout-flow wp-container-core-group-is-layout-03c184c1 wp-block-group-is-layout-flow" style="padding-bottom:100px">
<h2 class="wp-block-heading has-text-align-center has-large-font-size" style="padding-bottom:30px">Epic Fantasy Music Playlist</h2>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading has-text-align-left has-medium-font-size"><strong>Cover Art &amp; Story Opening</strong></h3>



<div class="wp-block-columns is-layout-flex wp-container-core-columns-is-layout-28f84493 wp-block-columns-is-layout-flex">
<div class="wp-block-column is-layout-flow wp-block-column-is-layout-flow" style="flex-basis:100%">
<div class="wp-block-group is-content-justification-center is-nowrap is-layout-flex wp-container-core-group-is-layout-23441af8 wp-block-group-is-layout-flex">
<figure class="wp-block-image size-full"><img data-recalc-dims="1" decoding="async" width="300" height="300" src="https://i0.wp.com/demfirecreation.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/04-epic-fantasy-music.webp?resize=300%2C300&#038;ssl=1" alt="Epic Fantasy" class="wp-image-750" style="object-fit:cover" srcset="https://i0.wp.com/demfirecreation.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/04-epic-fantasy-music.webp?w=300&amp;ssl=1 300w, https://i0.wp.com/demfirecreation.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/04-epic-fantasy-music.webp?resize=150%2C150&amp;ssl=1 150w, https://i0.wp.com/demfirecreation.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/04-epic-fantasy-music.webp?resize=200%2C200&amp;ssl=1 200w" sizes="(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px" /></figure>
</div>



<p class="has-text-align-center has-medium-font-size">Epic Ⅳ</p>



<p class="has-text-align-center has-small-font-size">&#8220;Danger lies ahead<br>Through waters and skies<br>I must fulfill—my destiny&#8221;<br>―Demfire Creation</p>
</div>
</div>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading has-medium-font-size"><strong>General Information</strong></h3>



<div class="wp-block-columns is-layout-flex wp-container-core-columns-is-layout-28f84493 wp-block-columns-is-layout-flex">
<div class="wp-block-column is-layout-flow wp-block-column-is-layout-flow">
<p>Specifications:</p>



<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>Song count: 80+</li>



<li>Duration: 4h+</li>



<li>Don&#8217;t shuffle</li>



<li>Updates on Friday</li>
</ul>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-column is-layout-flow wp-block-column-is-layout-flow">
<p>Type of music:</p>



<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>Soundtracks (OST):
<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>Video game music (VGM)</li>



<li>Film/movie scores</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>



<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>Background music (BGM)</li>
</ul>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-column is-layout-flow wp-block-column-is-layout-flow">
<p>Genre:</p>



<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>Epic fantasy music</li>



<li>Epic adventure music</li>



<li>Elf chants</li>
</ul>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-column is-layout-flow wp-block-column-is-layout-flow">
<p>Subgenres:</p>



<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>RPG music</li>



<li>MMORPG music</li>



<li>DnD background music</li>



<li>Magical music</li>



<li>Emotional music</li>
</ul>
</div>
</div>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-group alignwide has-medium-font-size is-layout-flow wp-block-group-is-layout-flow" style="padding-bottom:100px">
<h2 class="wp-block-heading has-text-align-center has-large-font-size" style="padding-bottom:30px">Epic Fantasy Music</h2>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading has-medium-font-size"><strong>Theme</strong></h3>



<p>My diverse playlist offers a variety of themes with a primary focus on fantasy.</p>



<p>You&#8217;ll find everything from epic orchestral pieces to soothing background tracks and even some elvish chants that you will encounter every few tracks for a touch of mysticism.</p>



<p>Some of the standout artists and songs featured in my playlist include:</p>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading has-medium-font-size"><strong>High Fantasy Music</strong></h3>



<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>&#8220;Main Theme pt.2&#8221; by Borislav Slavov from Baldur&#8217;s Gate 3 OST</li>



<li>&#8220;Ezio&#8217;s Family&#8221; by Jesper Kyd from Assassin&#8217;s Creed 2 OST</li>



<li>&#8220;The Banks Of The Sansretour&#8221; by Piotr Musial from The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt &#8211; Blood and Wine OST</li>
</ul>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading has-medium-font-size"><strong>Epic Adventure Music</strong></h3>



<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>&#8220;A Land of War and Poetry&#8221; by Brad Derrick &amp; Jeremy Soule from The Elder Scrolls Online: Morrowind OST</li>



<li>&#8220;A Son&#8217;s Path&#8221; by Bear McCreary from God of War: Ragnarök OST</li>



<li>&#8220;Epic Gaming Music (Enemy Airship Theme)&#8221; by Demfire Creation, album Epic Music Debut</li>
</ul>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading has-medium-font-size"><strong>Epic Elf Songs</strong></h3>



<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>&#8220;Forest Calling&#8221; by Bill Brown from Lineage 2 &#8211; Chaotic Chronicle OST</li>



<li>&#8220;Lust&#8221; by Inon Zur from Lineage 2 &#8211; Interlude OST</li>



<li>&#8220;Nightsong&#8221; by Neal Acree from World of Warcraft: Cataclysm OST</li>
</ul>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading has-medium-font-size"><strong>Heroic Fantasy Music</strong></h3>



<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>&#8220;People of the Land&#8221; by Jan Valta &amp; Adam Sporka from Kingdom Come: Deliverance OST</li>



<li>&#8220;Haven&#8221; by Jason Grave from Heroes of Might and Magic VI OST</li>



<li>&#8220;Shado-Pan&#8221; by Sam Cardon &amp; Jeremy Soule from World of Warcraft: Mist of Pandaria OST</li>
</ul>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading has-medium-font-size"><strong>Epic RPG Music</strong></h3>



<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>&#8220;The Vagabond&#8221; by Marcin Przybylowicz from The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt OST</li>



<li>&#8220;Ancient Forest&#8221; by NCSOFT from Aion OST</li>



<li>&#8220;Coastal Vivarium&#8221; by J Scott Rakozy from Hogwarts Legacy OST</li>
</ul>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading has-medium-font-size"><strong>DnD Background Music</strong></h3>



<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>&#8220;Kingdom of Bards&#8221; by Adrian Von Ziegler, album Libertas</li>



<li>&#8220;Harvest Dawn&#8221; by Jeremy Soule from The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion OST</li>



<li>&#8220;Caravans Crossing&#8221; by Jamie Christopherson from Lineage 2 Chaotic Chronicle OST</li>
</ul>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-group alignwide has-medium-font-size has-global-padding is-layout-constrained wp-container-core-group-is-layout-bf656810 wp-block-group-is-layout-constrained" style="padding-bottom:100px">
<h2 class="wp-block-heading has-text-align-center has-large-font-size" style="padding-bottom:25px">Related Playlists</h2>

<p class="has-text-align-center"><a href="https://demfirecreation.com/playlists/epic-space-music-2024-film-trailer-game-soundtracks" data-type="page" data-id="1041"><strong>Epic Ⅺ: Space/Time</strong></a></p>

forwards}.wp-lightbox-overlay.zoom.show-closing-animation:not(.active){animation:none}.wp-lightbox-overlay.zoom.show-closing-animation:not(.active) img{animation:none}.wp-lightbox-overlay.zoom.show-closing-animation:not(.active) .scrim{animation:turn-off-visibility .4s forwards}}@keyframes show-content-image{0%{visibility:hidden}99%{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@keyframes turn-on-visibility{0%{opacity:0}to{opacity:1}}@keyframes 	img.wp-smiley, img.emoji {

		border: none !important;
		box-shadow: none !important;

<p class="has-text-align-center">More info below.</p>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-group alignwide has-medium-font-size is-layout-flow wp-block-group-is-layout-flow" style="padding-bottom:100px">
<p>I <a href="https://demfirecreation.com/playlists"><strong>curate playlists</strong></a> on Spotify, YouTube Music, Deezer and Tidal.</p>



<p>After Epic Ⅰ, Epic Ⅱ &amp; Epic Ⅲ, this is my fourth epic playlist&#8217;s dedicated page, Epic Ⅳ: the epic fantasy playlist aka &#8220;Epic Fantasy Adventure/Elves&#8221;.</p>



<p>The playlist&#8217;s genres, subgenres and global information can be found below.</p>



<p>And some more information can be found in the second section, like songs and their respective artists that I listed under specific genre categories.</p>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-group alignwide has-medium-font-size is-layout-flow wp-container-core-group-is-layout-03c184c1 wp-block-group-is-layout-flow" style="padding-bottom:100px">
<h2 class="wp-block-heading has-text-align-center has-large-font-size" style="padding-bottom:30px">Epic Fantasy Music Playlist</h2>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading has-text-align-left has-medium-font-size"><strong>Cover Art &amp; Story Opening</strong></h3>



<div class="wp-block-columns is-layout-flex wp-container-core-columns-is-layout-28f84493 wp-block-columns-is-layout-flex">
<div class="wp-block-column is-layout-flow wp-block-column-is-layout-flow" style="flex-basis:100%">
<div class="wp-block-group is-content-justification-center is-nowrap is-layout-flex wp-container-core-group-is-layout-23441af8 wp-block-group-is-layout-flex">
<figure class="wp-block-image size-full"><img data-recalc-dims="1" decoding="async" width="300" height="300" src="https://i0.wp.com/demfirecreation.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/04-epic-fantasy-music.webp?resize=300%2C300&#038;ssl=1" alt="Epic Fantasy" class="wp-image-750" style="object-fit:cover" srcset="https://i0.wp.com/demfirecreation.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/04-epic-fantasy-music.webp?w=300&amp;ssl=1 300w, https://i0.wp.com/demfirecreation.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/04-epic-fantasy-music.webp?resize=150%2C150&amp;ssl=1 150w, https://i0.wp.com/demfirecreation.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/04-epic-fantasy-music.webp?resize=200%2C200&amp;ssl=1 200w" sizes="(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px" /></figure>
</div>



<p class="has-text-align-center has-medium-font-size">Epic Ⅳ</p>



<p class="has-text-align-center has-small-font-size">&#8220;Danger lies ahead<br>Through waters and skies<br>I must fulfill—my destiny&#8221;<br>―Demfire Creation</p>
</div>
</div>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading has-medium-font-size"><strong>General Information</strong></h3>



<div class="wp-block-columns is-layout-flex wp-container-core-columns-is-layout-28f84493 wp-block-columns-is-layout-flex">
<div class="wp-block-column is-layout-flow wp-block-column-is-layout-flow">
<p>Specifications:</p>



<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>Song count: 80+</li>



<li>Duration: 4h+</li>



<li>Don&#8217;t shuffle</li>



<li>Updates on Friday</li>
</ul>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-column is-layout-flow wp-block-column-is-layout-flow">
<p>Type of music:</p>



<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>Soundtracks (OST):
<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>Video game music (VGM)</li>



<li>Film/movie scores</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>



<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>Background music (BGM)</li>
</ul>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-column is-layout-flow wp-block-column-is-layout-flow">
<p>Genre:</p>



<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>Epic fantasy music</li>



<li>Epic adventure music</li>



<li>Elf chants</li>
</ul>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-column is-layout-flow wp-block-column-is-layout-flow">
<p>Subgenres:</p>



<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>RPG music</li>



<li>MMORPG music</li>



<li>DnD background music</li>



<li>Magical music</li>



<li>Emotional music</li>
</ul>
</div>
</div>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-group alignwide has-medium-font-size is-layout-flow wp-block-group-is-layout-flow" style="padding-bottom:100px">
<h2 class="wp-block-heading has-text-align-center has-large-font-size" style="padding-bottom:30px">Epic Fantasy Music</h2>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading has-medium-font-size"><strong>Theme</strong></h3>



<p>My diverse playlist offers a variety of themes with a primary focus on fantasy.</p>



<p>You&#8217;ll find everything from epic orchestral pieces to soothing background tracks and even some elvish chants that you will encounter every few tracks for a touch of mysticism.</p>



<p>Some of the standout artists and songs featured in my playlist include:</p>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading has-medium-font-size"><strong>High Fantasy Music</strong></h3>



<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>&#8220;Main Theme pt.2&#8221; by Borislav Slavov from Baldur&#8217;s Gate 3 OST</li>



<li>&#8220;Ezio&#8217;s Family&#8221; by Jesper Kyd from Assassin&#8217;s Creed 2 OST</li>



<li>&#8220;The Banks Of The Sansretour&#8221; by Piotr Musial from The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt &#8211; Blood and Wine OST</li>
</ul>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading has-medium-font-size"><strong>Epic Adventure Music</strong></h3>



<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>&#8220;A Land of War and Poetry&#8221; by Brad Derrick &amp; Jeremy Soule from The Elder Scrolls Online: Morrowind OST</li>



<li>&#8220;A Son&#8217;s Path&#8221; by Bear McCreary from God of War: Ragnarök OST</li>



<li>&#8220;Epic Gaming Music (Enemy Airship Theme)&#8221; by Demfire Creation, album Epic Music Debut</li>
</ul>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading has-medium-font-size"><strong>Epic Elf Songs</strong></h3>



<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>&#8220;Forest Calling&#8221; by Bill Brown from Lineage 2 &#8211; Chaotic Chronicle OST</li>



<li>&#8220;Lust&#8221; by Inon Zur from Lineage 2 &#8211; Interlude OST</li>



<li>&#8220;Nightsong&#8221; by Neal Acree from World of Warcraft: Cataclysm OST</li>
</ul>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading has-medium-font-size"><strong>Heroic Fantasy Music</strong></h3>



<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>&#8220;People of the Land&#8221; by Jan Valta &amp; Adam Sporka from Kingdom Come: Deliverance OST</li>



<li>&#8220;Haven&#8221; by Jason Grave from Heroes of Might and Magic VI OST</li>



<li>&#8220;Shado-Pan&#8221; by Sam Cardon &amp; Jeremy Soule from World of Warcraft: Mist of Pandaria OST</li>
</ul>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading has-medium-font-size"><strong>Epic RPG Music</strong></h3>



<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>&#8220;The Vagabond&#8221; by Marcin Przybylowicz from The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt OST</li>



<li>&#8220;Ancient Forest&#8221; by NCSOFT from Aion OST</li>



<li>&#8220;Coastal Vivarium&#8221; by J Scott Rakozy from Hogwarts Legacy OST</li>
</ul>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading has-medium-font-size"><strong>DnD Background Music</strong></h3>



<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>&#8220;Kingdom of Bards&#8221; by Adrian Von Ziegler, album Libertas</li>



<li>&#8220;Harvest Dawn&#8221; by Jeremy Soule from The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion OST</li>



<li>&#8220;Caravans Crossing&#8221; by Jamie Christopherson from Lineage 2 Chaotic Chronicle OST</li>
</ul>
</div>

			skipLink;

		// Early exit if a skip-link target can't be located.
		if ( ! skipLinkTarget ) {
			return;
		}

		/*
		 * Get the site wrapper.
		 * The skip-link will be injected in the beginning of it.

		sibling = document.querySelector( '.wp-site-blocks' );

		// Early exit if the root element was not found.
		if ( ! sibling ) {
			return;
		}

		// Get the skip-link target's ID, and generate one if it doesn't exist.
		skipLinkTargetID = skipLinkTarget.id;
		if ( ! skipLinkTargetID ) {

			skipLinkTarget.id = skipLinkTargetID;

		skipLink = document.createElement( 'a' );

		skipLink.href = '#' + skipLinkTargetID;
		skipLink.innerText = 'Skip to content';

		// Inject the skip link.
		sibling.parentElement.insertBefore( skipLink, sibling );
	}() );

<div class="wp-block-group alignwide has-medium-font-size is-layout-flow wp-block-group-is-layout-flow" style="padding-bottom:100px">
<p>I <a href="https://demfirecreation.com/playlists"><strong>curate playlists</strong></a> on Spotify, YouTube Music, Deezer and Tidal.</p>



<p>After Epic Ⅰ, Epic Ⅱ &amp; Epic Ⅲ, this is my fourth epic playlist&#8217;s dedicated page, Epic Ⅳ: the epic fantasy playlist aka &#8220;Epic Fantasy Adventure/Elves&#8221;.</p>



<p>The playlist&#8217;s genres, subgenres and global information can be found below.</p>



<p>And some more information can be found in the second section, like songs and their respective artists that I listed under specific genre categories.</p>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-group alignwide has-medium-font-size is-layout-flow wp-container-core-group-is-layout-03c184c1 wp-block-group-is-layout-flow" style="padding-bottom:100px">
<h2 class="wp-block-heading has-text-align-center has-large-font-size" style="padding-bottom:30px">Epic Fantasy Music Playlist</h2>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading has-text-align-left has-medium-font-size"><strong>Cover Art &amp; Story Opening</strong></h3>



<div class="wp-block-columns is-layout-flex wp-container-core-columns-is-layout-28f84493 wp-block-columns-is-layout-flex">
<div class="wp-block-column is-layout-flow wp-block-column-is-layout-flow" style="flex-basis:100%">
<div class="wp-block-group is-content-justification-center is-nowrap is-layout-flex wp-container-core-group-is-layout-23441af8 wp-block-group-is-layout-flex">
<figure class="wp-block-image size-full"><img data-recalc-dims="1" decoding="async" width="300" height="300" src="https://i0.wp.com/demfirecreation.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/04-epic-fantasy-music.webp?resize=300%2C300&#038;ssl=1" alt="Epic Fantasy" class="wp-image-750" style="object-fit:cover" srcset="https://i0.wp.com/demfirecreation.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/04-epic-fantasy-music.webp?w=300&amp;ssl=1 300w, https://i0.wp.com/demfirecreation.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/04-epic-fantasy-music.webp?resize=150%2C150&amp;ssl=1 150w, https://i0.wp.com/demfirecreation.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/04-epic-fantasy-music.webp?resize=200%2C200&amp;ssl=1 200w" sizes="(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px" /></figure>
</div>



<p class="has-text-align-center has-medium-font-size">Epic Ⅳ</p>



<p class="has-text-align-center has-small-font-size">&#8220;Danger lies ahead<br>Through waters and skies<br>I must fulfill—my destiny&#8221;<br>―Demfire Creation</p>
</div>
</div>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading has-medium-font-size"><strong>General Information</strong></h3>



<div class="wp-block-columns is-layout-flex wp-container-core-columns-is-layout-28f84493 wp-block-columns-is-layout-flex">
<div class="wp-block-column is-layout-flow wp-block-column-is-layout-flow">
<p>Specifications:</p>



<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>Song count: 80+</li>



<li>Duration: 4h+</li>



<li>Don&#8217;t shuffle</li>



<li>Updates on Friday</li>
</ul>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-column is-layout-flow wp-block-column-is-layout-flow">
<p>Type of music:</p>



<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>Soundtracks (OST):
<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>Video game music (VGM)</li>



<li>Film/movie scores</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>



<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>Background music (BGM)</li>
</ul>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-column is-layout-flow wp-block-column-is-layout-flow">
<p>Genre:</p>



<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>Epic fantasy music</li>



<li>Epic adventure music</li>



<li>Elf chants</li>
</ul>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-column is-layout-flow wp-block-column-is-layout-flow">
<p>Subgenres:</p>



<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>RPG music</li>



<li>MMORPG music</li>



<li>DnD background music</li>



<li>Magical music</li>



<li>Emotional music</li>
</ul>
</div>
</div>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-group alignwide has-medium-font-size is-layout-flow wp-block-group-is-layout-flow" style="padding-bottom:100px">
<h2 class="wp-block-heading has-text-align-center has-large-font-size" style="padding-bottom:30px">Epic Fantasy Music</h2>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading has-medium-font-size"><strong>Theme</strong></h3>



<p>My diverse playlist offers a variety of themes with a primary focus on fantasy.</p>



<p>You&#8217;ll find everything from epic orchestral pieces to soothing background tracks and even some elvish chants that you will encounter every few tracks for a touch of mysticism.</p>



<p>Some of the standout artists and songs featured in my playlist include:</p>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading has-medium-font-size"><strong>High Fantasy Music</strong></h3>



<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>&#8220;Main Theme pt.2&#8221; by Borislav Slavov from Baldur&#8217;s Gate 3 OST</li>



<li>&#8220;Ezio&#8217;s Family&#8221; by Jesper Kyd from Assassin&#8217;s Creed 2 OST</li>



<li>&#8220;The Banks Of The Sansretour&#8221; by Piotr Musial from The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt &#8211; Blood and Wine OST</li>
</ul>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading has-medium-font-size"><strong>Epic Adventure Music</strong></h3>



<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>&#8220;A Land of War and Poetry&#8221; by Brad Derrick &amp; Jeremy Soule from The Elder Scrolls Online: Morrowind OST</li>



<li>&#8220;A Son&#8217;s Path&#8221; by Bear McCreary from God of War: Ragnarök OST</li>



<li>&#8220;Epic Gaming Music (Enemy Airship Theme)&#8221; by Demfire Creation, album Epic Music Debut</li>
</ul>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading has-medium-font-size"><strong>Epic Elf Songs</strong></h3>



<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>&#8220;Forest Calling&#8221; by Bill Brown from Lineage 2 &#8211; Chaotic Chronicle OST</li>



<li>&#8220;Lust&#8221; by Inon Zur from Lineage 2 &#8211; Interlude OST</li>



<li>&#8220;Nightsong&#8221; by Neal Acree from World of Warcraft: Cataclysm OST</li>
</ul>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading has-medium-font-size"><strong>Heroic Fantasy Music</strong></h3>



<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>&#8220;People of the Land&#8221; by Jan Valta &amp; Adam Sporka from Kingdom Come: Deliverance OST</li>



<li>&#8220;Haven&#8221; by Jason Grave from Heroes of Might and Magic VI OST</li>



<li>&#8220;Shado-Pan&#8221; by Sam Cardon &amp; Jeremy Soule from World of Warcraft: Mist of Pandaria OST</li>
</ul>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading has-medium-font-size"><strong>Epic RPG Music</strong></h3>



<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>&#8220;The Vagabond&#8221; by Marcin Przybylowicz from The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt OST</li>



<li>&#8220;Ancient Forest&#8221; by NCSOFT from Aion OST</li>



<li>&#8220;Coastal Vivarium&#8221; by J Scott Rakozy from Hogwarts Legacy OST</li>
</ul>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading has-medium-font-size"><strong>DnD Background Music</strong></h3>



<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>&#8220;Kingdom of Bards&#8221; by Adrian Von Ziegler, album Libertas</li>



<li>&#8220;Harvest Dawn&#8221; by Jeremy Soule from The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion OST</li>



<li>&#8220;Caravans Crossing&#8221; by Jamie Christopherson from Lineage 2 Chaotic Chronicle OST</li>
</ul>
</div>

		if ( ! skipLinkTarget ) {

		 * Get the site wrapper.
		 * The skip-link will be injected in the beginning of it.

		if ( ! sibling ) {

		skipLinkTargetID = skipLinkTarget.id;

		sibling.parentElement.insertBefore( skipLink, sibling );

:root{--wp--preset--aspect-ratio--square: 1;--wp--preset--aspect-ratio--4-3: 4/3;--wp--preset--aspect-ratio--3-4: 3/4;--wp--preset--aspect-ratio--3-2: 3/2;--wp--preset--aspect-ratio--2-3: <div class="wp-block-group alignwide has-medium-font-size is-layout-flow wp-block-group-is-layout-flow" style="padding-bottom:100px">
<p>I <a href="https://demfirecreation.com/playlists"><strong>curate playlists</strong></a> on Spotify, YouTube Music, Deezer and Tidal.</p>



<p>After Epic Ⅰ, Epic Ⅱ &amp; Epic Ⅲ, this is my fourth epic playlist&#8217;s dedicated page, Epic Ⅳ: the epic fantasy playlist aka &#8220;Epic Fantasy Adventure/Elves&#8221;.</p>



<p>The playlist&#8217;s genres, subgenres and global information can be found below.</p>



<p>And some more information can be found in the second section, like songs and their respective artists that I listed under specific genre categories.</p>

<div class="wp-block-group alignwide has-medium-font-size is-layout-flow wp-container-core-group-is-layout-03c184c1 wp-block-group-is-layout-flow" style="padding-bottom:100px">
<h2 class="wp-block-heading has-text-align-center has-large-font-size" style="padding-bottom:30px">Epic Fantasy Music Playlist</h2>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading has-text-align-left has-medium-font-size"><strong>Cover Art &amp; Story Opening</strong></h3>



<div class="wp-block-columns is-layout-flex wp-container-core-columns-is-layout-28f84493 wp-block-columns-is-layout-flex">
<div class="wp-block-column is-layout-flow wp-block-column-is-layout-flow" style="flex-basis:100%">
<div class="wp-block-group is-content-justification-center is-nowrap is-layout-flex wp-container-core-group-is-layout-23441af8 wp-block-group-is-layout-flex">
<figure class="wp-block-image size-full"><img data-recalc-dims="1" decoding="async" width="300" height="300" src="https://i0.wp.com/demfirecreation.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/04-epic-fantasy-music.webp?resize=300%2C300&#038;ssl=1" alt="Epic Fantasy" class="wp-image-750" style="object-fit:cover" srcset="https://i0.wp.com/demfirecreation.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/04-epic-fantasy-music.webp?w=300&amp;ssl=1 300w, https://i0.wp.com/demfirecreation.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/04-epic-fantasy-music.webp?resize=150%2C150&amp;ssl=1 150w, https://i0.wp.com/demfirecreation.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/04-epic-fantasy-music.webp?resize=200%2C200&amp;ssl=1 200w" sizes="(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px" /></figure>
</div>



<p class="has-text-align-center has-medium-font-size">Epic Ⅳ</p>



<p class="has-text-align-center has-small-font-size">&#8220;Danger lies ahead<br>Through waters and skies<br>I must fulfill—my destiny&#8221;<br>―Demfire Creation</p>
</div>
</div>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading has-medium-font-size"><strong>General Information</strong></h3>



<div class="wp-block-columns is-layout-flex wp-container-core-columns-is-layout-28f84493 wp-block-columns-is-layout-flex">
<div class="wp-block-column is-layout-flow wp-block-column-is-layout-flow">
<p>Specifications:</p>



<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>Song count: 80+</li>



<li>Duration: 4h+</li>



<li>Don&#8217;t shuffle</li>



<li>Updates on Friday</li>
</ul>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-column is-layout-flow wp-block-column-is-layout-flow">
<p>Type of music:</p>



<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>Soundtracks (OST):
<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>Video game music (VGM)</li>



<li>Film/movie scores</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>



<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>Background music (BGM)</li>
</ul>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-column is-layout-flow wp-block-column-is-layout-flow">
<p>Genre:</p>



<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>Epic fantasy music</li>



<li>Epic adventure music</li>



<li>Elf chants</li>
</ul>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-column is-layout-flow wp-block-column-is-layout-flow">
<p>Subgenres:</p>



<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>RPG music</li>



<li>MMORPG music</li>



<li>DnD background music</li>



<li>Magical music</li>



<li>Emotional music</li>
</ul>
</div>
</div>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-group alignwide has-medium-font-size is-layout-flow wp-block-group-is-layout-flow" style="padding-bottom:100px">
<h2 class="wp-block-heading has-text-align-center has-large-font-size" style="padding-bottom:30px">Epic Fantasy Music</h2>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading has-medium-font-size"><strong>Theme</strong></h3>



<p>My diverse playlist offers a variety of themes with a primary focus on fantasy.</p>



<p>You&#8217;ll find everything from epic orchestral pieces to soothing background tracks and even some elvish chants that you will encounter every few tracks for a touch of mysticism.</p>



<p>Some of the standout artists and songs featured in my playlist include:</p>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading has-medium-font-size"><strong>High Fantasy Music</strong></h3>



<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>&#8220;Main Theme pt.2&#8221; by Borislav Slavov from Baldur&#8217;s Gate 3 OST</li>



<li>&#8220;Ezio&#8217;s Family&#8221; by Jesper Kyd from Assassin&#8217;s Creed 2 OST</li>



<li>&#8220;The Banks Of The Sansretour&#8221; by Piotr Musial from The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt &#8211; Blood and Wine OST</li>
</ul>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading has-medium-font-size"><strong>Epic Adventure Music</strong></h3>



<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>&#8220;A Land of War and Poetry&#8221; by Brad Derrick &amp; Jeremy Soule from The Elder Scrolls Online: Morrowind OST</li>



<li>&#8220;A Son&#8217;s Path&#8221; by Bear McCreary from God of War: Ragnarök OST</li>



<li>&#8220;Epic Gaming Music (Enemy Airship Theme)&#8221; by Demfire Creation, album Epic Music Debut</li>
</ul>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading has-medium-font-size"><strong>Epic Elf Songs</strong></h3>



<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>&#8220;Forest Calling&#8221; by Bill Brown from Lineage 2 &#8211; Chaotic Chronicle OST</li>



<li>&#8220;Lust&#8221; by Inon Zur from Lineage 2 &#8211; Interlude OST</li>



<li>&#8220;Nightsong&#8221; by Neal Acree from World of Warcraft: Cataclysm OST</li>
</ul>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading has-medium-font-size"><strong>Heroic Fantasy Music</strong></h3>



<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>&#8220;People of the Land&#8221; by Jan Valta &amp; Adam Sporka from Kingdom Come: Deliverance OST</li>



<li>&#8220;Haven&#8221; by Jason Grave from Heroes of Might and Magic VI OST</li>



<li>&#8220;Shado-Pan&#8221; by Sam Cardon &amp; Jeremy Soule from World of Warcraft: Mist of Pandaria OST</li>
</ul>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading has-medium-font-size"><strong>Epic RPG Music</strong></h3>



<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>&#8220;The Vagabond&#8221; by Marcin Przybylowicz from The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt OST</li>



<li>&#8220;Ancient Forest&#8221; by NCSOFT from Aion OST</li>



<li>&#8220;Coastal Vivarium&#8221; by J Scott Rakozy from Hogwarts Legacy OST</li>
</ul>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading has-medium-font-size"><strong>DnD Background Music</strong></h3>



<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>&#8220;Kingdom of Bards&#8221; by Adrian Von Ziegler, album Libertas</li>



<li>&#8220;Harvest Dawn&#8221; by Jeremy Soule from The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion OST</li>



<li>&#8220;Caravans Crossing&#8221; by Jamie Christopherson from Lineage 2 Chaotic Chronicle OST</li>
</ul>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-group alignwide has-medium-font-size has-global-padding is-layout-constrained wp-container-core-group-is-layout-bf656810 wp-block-group-is-layout-constrained" style="padding-bottom:100px">

				e && ( e.media = 'not all' );

	( function() {
		var skipLinkTarget = document.querySelector( 'main' ),
			sibling,
			skipLinkTargetID,
			skipLink;

		// Early exit if a skip-link target can't be located.
		if ( ! skipLinkTarget ) {
			return;
		}

		/*
		 * Get the site wrapper.
		 * The skip-link will be injected in the beginning of it.
		 */
		sibling = document.querySelector( '.wp-site-blocks' );

		// Early exit if the root element was not found.
		if ( ! sibling ) {
			return;
		}

		// Get the skip-link target's ID, and generate one if it doesn't exist.
		skipLinkTargetID = skipLinkTarget.id;
		if ( ! skipLinkTargetID ) {
			skipLinkTargetID = 'wp--skip-link--target';
			skipLinkTarget.id = skipLinkTargetID;
		}

		// Create the skip link.
		skipLink = document.createElement( 'a' );
		skipLink.classList.add( 'skip-link', 'screen-reader-text' );
		skipLink.id = 'wp-skip-link';
		skipLink.href = '#' + skipLinkTargetID;
		skipLink.innerText = 'Skip to content';

		// Inject the skip link.
		sibling.parentElement.insertBefore( skipLink, sibling );
	}() );

<main class="wp-block-group is-layout-flow wp-container-core-group-is-layout-bb62f62d wp-block-group-is-layout-flow" style="margin-top:0">
    <div class="entry-content wp-block-post-content has-global-padding is-layout-constrained wp-block-post-content-is-layout-constrained">
<div class="wp-block-group alignwide has-medium-font-size is-vertical is-content-justification-left is-layout-flex wp-container-core-group-is-layout-f5ebf64a wp-block-group-is-layout-flex" style="border-style:none;border-width:0px;border-radius:0px;min-height:85vh;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0;padding-top:0;padding-right:0;padding-bottom:0;padding-left:0">
<h1 class="wp-block-heading alignwide has-text-align-center has-x-large-font-size">Epic Fantasy Music &#8211; 2025 Playlist: Adventure, RPG Songs</h1>



<p class="has-medium-font-size">Regular updates<br><br>Playlist curated<br>since 2022</p>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-group alignwide has-medium-font-size has-global-padding is-content-justification-center is-layout-constrained wp-block-group-is-layout-constrained" style="padding-bottom:25px">
<h2 class="wp-block-heading alignwide has-text-align-center has-large-font-size">Epic IV: The Fantasy Playlist</h2>



<p class="has-text-align-center">Theme: High Fantasy (Orchestral &amp; DnD Background)</p>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-group alignwide is-content-justification-center is-nowrap is-layout-flex wp-container-core-group-is-layout-23441af8 wp-block-group-is-layout-flex">

<div class="wp-block-group alignwide has-medium-font-size is-layout-flow wp-block-group-is-layout-flow" style="padding-bottom:100px">
<p>I <a href="https://demfirecreation.com/playlists"><strong>curate playlists</strong></a> on Spotify, YouTube Music, Deezer and Tidal.</p>



<p>After Epic Ⅰ, Epic Ⅱ &amp; Epic Ⅲ, this is my fourth epic playlist&#8217;s dedicated page, Epic Ⅳ: the epic fantasy playlist aka &#8220;Epic Fantasy Adventure/Elves&#8221;.</p>



<p>The playlist&#8217;s genres, subgenres and global information can be found below.</p>



<p>And some more information can be found in the second section, like songs and their respective artists that I listed under specific genre categories.</p>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-group alignwide has-medium-font-size is-layout-flow wp-container-core-group-is-layout-03c184c1 wp-block-group-is-layout-flow" style="padding-bottom:100px">
<h2 class="wp-block-heading has-text-align-center has-large-font-size" style="padding-bottom:30px">Epic Fantasy Music Playlist</h2>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading has-text-align-left has-medium-font-size"><strong>Cover Art &amp; Story Opening</strong></h3>



<div class="wp-block-columns is-layout-flex wp-container-core-columns-is-layout-28f84493 wp-block-columns-is-layout-flex">
<div class="wp-block-column is-layout-flow wp-block-column-is-layout-flow" style="flex-basis:100%">
<div class="wp-block-group is-content-justification-center is-nowrap is-layout-flex wp-container-core-group-is-layout-23441af8 wp-block-group-is-layout-flex">
<figure class="wp-block-image size-full"><img data-recalc-dims="1" decoding="async" width="300" height="300" src="https://i0.wp.com/demfirecreation.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/04-epic-fantasy-music.webp?resize=300%2C300&#038;ssl=1" alt="Epic Fantasy" class="wp-image-750" style="object-fit:cover" srcset="https://i0.wp.com/demfirecreation.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/04-epic-fantasy-music.webp?w=300&amp;ssl=1 300w, https://i0.wp.com/demfirecreation.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/04-epic-fantasy-music.webp?resize=150%2C150&amp;ssl=1 150w, https://i0.wp.com/demfirecreation.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/04-epic-fantasy-music.webp?resize=200%2C200&amp;ssl=1 200w" sizes="(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px" /></figure>
</div>



<p class="has-text-align-center has-medium-font-size">Epic Ⅳ</p>



<p class="has-text-align-center has-small-font-size">&#8220;Danger lies ahead<br>Through waters and skies<br>I must fulfill—my destiny&#8221;<br>―Demfire Creation</p>
</div>
</div>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading has-medium-font-size"><strong>General Information</strong></h3>



<div class="wp-block-columns is-layout-flex wp-container-core-columns-is-layout-28f84493 wp-block-columns-is-layout-flex">
<div class="wp-block-column is-layout-flow wp-block-column-is-layout-flow">
<p>Specifications:</p>



<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>Song count: 80+</li>



<li>Duration: 4h+</li>



<li>Don&#8217;t shuffle</li>



<li>Updates on Friday</li>
</ul>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-column is-layout-flow wp-block-column-is-layout-flow">
<p>Type of music:</p>



<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>Soundtracks (OST):
<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>Video game music (VGM)</li>



<li>Film/movie scores</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>



<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>Background music (BGM)</li>
</ul>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-column is-layout-flow wp-block-column-is-layout-flow">
<p>Genre:</p>



<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>Epic fantasy music</li>



<li>Epic adventure music</li>



<li>Elf chants</li>
</ul>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-column is-layout-flow wp-block-column-is-layout-flow">
<p>Subgenres:</p>



<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>RPG music</li>



<li>MMORPG music</li>



<li>DnD background music</li>



<li>Magical music</li>



<li>Emotional music</li>
</ul>
</div>
</div>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-group alignwide has-medium-font-size is-layout-flow wp-block-group-is-layout-flow" style="padding-bottom:100px">
<h2 class="wp-block-heading has-text-align-center has-large-font-size" style="padding-bottom:30px">Epic Fantasy Music</h2>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading has-medium-font-size"><strong>Theme</strong></h3>



<p>My diverse playlist offers a variety of themes with a primary focus on fantasy.</p>



<p>You&#8217;ll find everything from epic orchestral pieces to soothing background tracks and even some elvish chants that you will encounter every few tracks for a touch of mysticism.</p>



<p>Some of the standout artists and songs featured in my playlist include:</p>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading has-medium-font-size"><strong>High Fantasy Music</strong></h3>



<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>&#8220;Main Theme pt.2&#8221; by Borislav Slavov from Baldur&#8217;s Gate 3 OST</li>



<li>&#8220;Ezio&#8217;s Family&#8221; by Jesper Kyd from Assassin&#8217;s Creed 2 OST</li>



<li>&#8220;The Banks Of The Sansretour&#8221; by Piotr Musial from The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt &#8211; Blood and Wine OST</li>
</ul>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading has-medium-font-size"><strong>Epic Adventure Music</strong></h3>



<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>&#8220;A Land of War and Poetry&#8221; by Brad Derrick &amp; Jeremy Soule from The Elder Scrolls Online: Morrowind OST</li>



<li>&#8220;A Son&#8217;s Path&#8221; by Bear McCreary from God of War: Ragnarök OST</li>



<li>&#8220;Epic Gaming Music (Enemy Airship Theme)&#8221; by Demfire Creation, album Epic Music Debut</li>
</ul>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading has-medium-font-size"><strong>Epic Elf Songs</strong></h3>



<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>&#8220;Forest Calling&#8221; by Bill Brown from Lineage 2 &#8211; Chaotic Chronicle OST</li>



<li>&#8220;Lust&#8221; by Inon Zur from Lineage 2 &#8211; Interlude OST</li>



<li>&#8220;Nightsong&#8221; by Neal Acree from World of Warcraft: Cataclysm OST</li>
</ul>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading has-medium-font-size"><strong>Heroic Fantasy Music</strong></h3>



<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>&#8220;People of the Land&#8221; by Jan Valta &amp; Adam Sporka from Kingdom Come: Deliverance OST</li>



<li>&#8220;Haven&#8221; by Jason Grave from Heroes of Might and Magic VI OST</li>



<li>&#8220;Shado-Pan&#8221; by Sam Cardon &amp; Jeremy Soule from World of Warcraft: Mist of Pandaria OST</li>
</ul>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading has-medium-font-size"><strong>Epic RPG Music</strong></h3>



<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>&#8220;The Vagabond&#8221; by Marcin Przybylowicz from The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt OST</li>



<li>&#8220;Ancient Forest&#8221; by NCSOFT from Aion OST</li>



<li>&#8220;Coastal Vivarium&#8221; by J Scott Rakozy from Hogwarts Legacy OST</li>
</ul>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading has-medium-font-size"><strong>DnD Background Music</strong></h3>



<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>&#8220;Kingdom of Bards&#8221; by Adrian Von Ziegler, album Libertas</li>



<li>&#8220;Harvest Dawn&#8221; by Jeremy Soule from The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion OST</li>



<li>&#8220;Caravans Crossing&#8221; by Jamie Christopherson from Lineage 2 Chaotic Chronicle OST</li>
</ul>
</div>

		 * Get the site wrapper.
		 * The skip-link will be injected in the beginning of it.

		sibling.parentElement.insertBefore( skipLink, sibling );

<div class="wp-block-group alignwide has-medium-font-size is-layout-flow wp-block-group-is-layout-flow" style="padding-bottom:100px">
<p>I <a href="https://demfirecreation.com/playlists"><strong>curate playlists</strong></a> on Spotify, YouTube Music, Deezer and Tidal.</p>



<p>After Epic Ⅰ, Epic Ⅱ &amp; Epic Ⅲ, this is my fourth epic playlist&#8217;s dedicated page, Epic Ⅳ: the epic fantasy playlist aka &#8220;Epic Fantasy Adventure/Elves&#8221;.</p>



<p>The playlist&#8217;s genres, subgenres and global information can be found below.</p>



<p>And some more information can be found in the second section, like songs and their respective artists that I listed under specific genre categories.</p>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-group alignwide has-medium-font-size is-layout-flow wp-container-core-group-is-layout-03c184c1 wp-block-group-is-layout-flow" style="padding-bottom:100px">
<h2 class="wp-block-heading has-text-align-center has-large-font-size" style="padding-bottom:30px">Epic Fantasy Music Playlist</h2>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading has-text-align-left has-medium-font-size"><strong>Cover Art &amp; Story Opening</strong></h3>



<div class="wp-block-columns is-layout-flex wp-container-core-columns-is-layout-28f84493 wp-block-columns-is-layout-flex">
<div class="wp-block-column is-layout-flow wp-block-column-is-layout-flow" style="flex-basis:100%">
<div class="wp-block-group is-content-justification-center is-nowrap is-layout-flex wp-container-core-group-is-layout-23441af8 wp-block-group-is-layout-flex">
<figure class="wp-block-image size-full"><img data-recalc-dims="1" decoding="async" width="300" height="300" src="https://i0.wp.com/demfirecreation.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/04-epic-fantasy-music.webp?resize=300%2C300&#038;ssl=1" alt="Epic Fantasy" class="wp-image-750" style="object-fit:cover" srcset="https://i0.wp.com/demfirecreation.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/04-epic-fantasy-music.webp?w=300&amp;ssl=1 300w, https://i0.wp.com/demfirecreation.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/04-epic-fantasy-music.webp?resize=150%2C150&amp;ssl=1 150w, https://i0.wp.com/demfirecreation.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/04-epic-fantasy-music.webp?resize=200%2C200&amp;ssl=1 200w" sizes="(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px" /></figure>
</div>



<p class="has-text-align-center has-medium-font-size">Epic Ⅳ</p>



<p class="has-text-align-center has-small-font-size">&#8220;Danger lies ahead<br>Through waters and skies<br>I must fulfill—my destiny&#8221;<br>―Demfire Creation</p>
</div>
</div>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading has-medium-font-size"><strong>General Information</strong></h3>



<div class="wp-block-columns is-layout-flex wp-container-core-columns-is-layout-28f84493 wp-block-columns-is-layout-flex">
<div class="wp-block-column is-layout-flow wp-block-column-is-layout-flow">
<p>Specifications:</p>



<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>Song count: 80+</li>



<li>Duration: 4h+</li>



<li>Don&#8217;t shuffle</li>



<li>Updates on Friday</li>
</ul>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-column is-layout-flow wp-block-column-is-layout-flow">
<p>Type of music:</p>



<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>Soundtracks (OST):
<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>Video game music (VGM)</li>



<li>Film/movie scores</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>



<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>Background music (BGM)</li>
</ul>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-column is-layout-flow wp-block-column-is-layout-flow">
<p>Genre:</p>



<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>Epic fantasy music</li>



<li>Epic adventure music</li>



<li>Elf chants</li>
</ul>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-column is-layout-flow wp-block-column-is-layout-flow">
<p>Subgenres:</p>



<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>RPG music</li>



<li>MMORPG music</li>



<li>DnD background music</li>



<li>Magical music</li>



<li>Emotional music</li>
</ul>
</div>
</div>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-group alignwide has-medium-font-size is-layout-flow wp-block-group-is-layout-flow" style="padding-bottom:100px">
<h2 class="wp-block-heading has-text-align-center has-large-font-size" style="padding-bottom:30px">Epic Fantasy Music</h2>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading has-medium-font-size"><strong>Theme</strong></h3>



<p>My diverse playlist offers a variety of themes with a primary focus on fantasy.</p>



<p>You&#8217;ll find everything from epic orchestral pieces to soothing background tracks and even some elvish chants that you will encounter every few tracks for a touch of mysticism.</p>



<p>Some of the standout artists and songs featured in my playlist include:</p>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading has-medium-font-size"><strong>High Fantasy Music</strong></h3>



<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>&#8220;Main Theme pt.2&#8221; by Borislav Slavov from Baldur&#8217;s Gate 3 OST</li>



<li>&#8220;Ezio&#8217;s Family&#8221; by Jesper Kyd from Assassin&#8217;s Creed 2 OST</li>



<li>&#8220;The Banks Of The Sansretour&#8221; by Piotr Musial from The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt &#8211; Blood and Wine OST</li>
</ul>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading has-medium-font-size"><strong>Epic Adventure Music</strong></h3>



<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>&#8220;A Land of War and Poetry&#8221; by Brad Derrick &amp; Jeremy Soule from The Elder Scrolls Online: Morrowind OST</li>



<li>&#8220;A Son&#8217;s Path&#8221; by Bear McCreary from God of War: Ragnarök OST</li>



<li>&#8220;Epic Gaming Music (Enemy Airship Theme)&#8221; by Demfire Creation, album Epic Music Debut</li>
</ul>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading has-medium-font-size"><strong>Epic Elf Songs</strong></h3>



<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>&#8220;Forest Calling&#8221; by Bill Brown from Lineage 2 &#8211; Chaotic Chronicle OST</li>



<li>&#8220;Lust&#8221; by Inon Zur from Lineage 2 &#8211; Interlude OST</li>



<li>&#8220;Nightsong&#8221; by Neal Acree from World of Warcraft: Cataclysm OST</li>
</ul>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading has-medium-font-size"><strong>Heroic Fantasy Music</strong></h3>



<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>&#8220;People of the Land&#8221; by Jan Valta &amp; Adam Sporka from Kingdom Come: Deliverance OST</li>



<li>&#8220;Haven&#8221; by Jason Grave from Heroes of Might and Magic VI OST</li>



<li>&#8220;Shado-Pan&#8221; by Sam Cardon &amp; Jeremy Soule from World of Warcraft: Mist of Pandaria OST</li>
</ul>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading has-medium-font-size"><strong>Epic RPG Music</strong></h3>



<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>&#8220;The Vagabond&#8221; by Marcin Przybylowicz from The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt OST</li>



<li>&#8220;Ancient Forest&#8221; by NCSOFT from Aion OST</li>



<li>&#8220;Coastal Vivarium&#8221; by J Scott Rakozy from Hogwarts Legacy OST</li>
</ul>



<h3 class="wp-block-heading has-medium-font-size"><strong>DnD Background Music</strong></h3>



<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>&#8220;Kingdom of Bards&#8221; by Adrian Von Ziegler, album Libertas</li>



<li>&#8220;Harvest Dawn&#8221; by Jeremy Soule from The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion OST</li>



<li>&#8220;Caravans Crossing&#8221; by Jamie Christopherson from Lineage 2 Chaotic Chronicle OST</li>
</ul>
</div>
